article.Heading: Budget expectations for the manufacturing sector
article.Summary: Key pre-budget expectations for the manufacturing sector from Anil V. Pillai, Director, Terragni Consulting for SMEs & MSMEs
article.Body:
Appended below is the pre-budget expectation quote from Mr. Anil V. Pillai, Director, Terragni Consulting specific to the Manufacturing sector.

Key pre-budget expectations for the manufacturing sector:

a) Significant budget impetus to the Skill India program.

b) Rationalization of power tariff structures for manufacturing industry.

c) Impetus for Mudra for SME and MSME working capital requirements

d) Labour reform timelines.

e) GST timelines to be announced or else in its absence centrally levied taxes to be rationalized.

f) Higher fiscal encouragement for technology absorption, innovation and industry-academia research projects.
